greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangular indicator function for divisibility, read by rows.
comment: Old name was: A Moebius triangle.
Reversed rows concatenated give A113705 (inverse Moebius transform of powers of 10).
formula: Number triangle where column k has g.f. 1/(1-x^k), k >= 1. Column 0 has g.f. 1.
T(n,d) = 1 if d|n, otherwise 0. - _Gus Wiseman_, Mar 06 2020
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Nov 05 2005
